titleStmt.title: A new discoverie of Mr. Jermyns conspiracy. Being the coppie of a letter sent from France from the said Mr. Iermyn, to a nobleman in the North. With divers other passages from Yorke. Published by a true copie.
titleStmt.author: St. Albans, Henry Jermyn, Earl of, ca. 1604-1684.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
